full_text:
1 DETECTIVE: Did he ejaculate inside?
2
3
4
5
6
7 DETECTIVE: Okay. How much did you call - that was in the middle of the two year thing?
8
9
10 Not so much towards the end, but definitely once I was comfortable with working there once I like would go there a lot, yeah. That was, it had to be towards the middle cause towards the end I only worked very sporadically throughout like maybe once or twice a month, not even. Um, in the middle I was working the most, I'd work every day that he was in the country. Every single day.
18 DETECTIVE: Okay. From that moment on, that's when the car came in? After that the car came?
19
20
21 I told him that my parents kicked me out, um, well, oh. Okay, this is how it went. Like I'm sorry, I'm remembering more and more as I talk to you. I worked for him and then I, I think after like things started getting like too like in like once he started going further and further, um I stopped working for him for a little while. Like, Sarah left a message on my cell phone. My mom took my cell phone away and she checked my messages and Sarah goes 'Oh, Jeffrey wants to know if you can come by and bring a friend.' And my mom goes 'What the fuck are you doing? Like, are you a prostitute?' And I was like, 'No mom, I'm just a secretary, and you know what, he has a girlfriend, Nadia um doesn't have any friends,' I'm like 'she wanted me to bring over people to hang out, you know.' And my mom was like, okay, I don't know. She was in denial, obviously, she, I think she knows that deep down in her heart. But um, after my mom heard that message she made me call Sarah, um, and tell her right in front of my- my mom made me tell Sarah right in front of her that I couldn't work there anymore, that I couldn't go there anymore. And then a few months went by at, no like, well I guess you could say like a month or two, I don't want to say a couple, like a few months cause it wasn't that long. But it was like a month or two, and then I called him and um, I told him that I, my parents kicked me out and so they weren't, they weren't gonna interfere with anything and then I continued to work. Towards the end, I stopped working for about probably six weeks, um, cause my boyfriend Will, the kid that I'm still with now. Um, he, it like tore him up to
Defense Transcript 07/26/17 30 October 11, 2005 PBPD & Page 2369 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032682
